fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Organic legislation, circular economy, fertilizers regulation revision, regulation (EC) 1107/2009 for the EU autorization of low risk active substances, Sustainable Use Directive.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: IBMA, EBIC, Freshfel, IPIFF, LTO Nederland, GlobalGAP, Ecofi, Artemis, EIT Food
goals__remit: Koppert provides an integrated system of specialist knowledge and natural, safe solutions that improves crop health, resilience and production.
relevant_communication: Once a year Koppert publishes her annual activity report. The report gives an overview over the activities of Koppert and her subsidiaries/regions.
